resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106722</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106722</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211410</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ohm's Law</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Des Ohms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Loi de l'Ohm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei Do Ohm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge Dell'Ohm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμος ωμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ley Del Ohmio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">See how the equation form of Ohm's law relates to a simple circuit. Adjust the voltage and resistance, and see the current change according to Ohm's law. The sizes of the symbols in the equation change to match the circuit diagram.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen Sie, wie das Gleichung Formular des Gesetzes 
des Ohms auf einem einfachen Stromkreis in Verbindung steht. 
Justieren Sie die Spannung und den Widerstand, und sehen Sie die
aktuelle Änderung entsprechend Gesetz des Ohms. Die Größen 
der Symbole in der Gleichung ändern, um den Schaltplan 
zusammenzubringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyez comment la forme d'équation de la loi de 
l'ohm associe à un circuit simple. Ajustez la tension et la 
résistance, et voyez le changement actuel selon la loi de l'ohm. 
Les tailles des symboles dans l'équation changent pour apparier
le schéma de circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Veja como o formulário da equação da lei do ohm
se relaciona a um circuito simples. Ajuste a tensão e a 
resistência, e veja a mudança atual de acordo com a lei do ohm. 
Os tamanhos dos símbolos na equação mudam para combinar o 
diagrama de circuito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Veda come la forma di equazione di legge dell'Ohm 
si riferisce ad un circuito semplice. Registri la tensione e la 
resistenza e veda il cambiamento corrente secondo legge dell'Ohm. 
I formati dei simboli nell'equazione cambiano per abbinare lo 
schema circuitale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δείτε πώς η μορφή εξίσωσης του νόμου του ωμ
αφορά ένα απλό κύκλωμα. Ρυθμίστε την τάση και την 
αντίσταση, και δείτε το ρεύμα αλλάζει τη χορήγηση στο 
νόμο του ωμ. Τα μεγέθη των συμβόλων στην εξίσωση αλλάζουν 
για να ταιριάξουν με το διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vea cómo la forma de la ecuación de la ley del 
ohmio se relaciona con un circuito simple. Ajuste el voltaje y 
la resistencia, y vea el cambio actual según la ley del ohmio. 
Las tallas de los símbolos en la ecuación cambian para 
corresponder con el esquema circular.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211410</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106722</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/ohm-s-law</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
